traits.appearance: wears distinctive jewelry: earrings, necklace, circlet, bracelets
traits.abilities: is powerful, brawny, and strong as an ox, but is dull and boring

personality.mannerism: Uses prestigidation repeatedly to create unnecessary effects to make himself look occupied
personality.interaction: is always honest with the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Quickly, at a Normal pitch.
voice.quirk: Heavy lisp on Th and S (th-ufferin th-uckertash!)
